column1: treaderrion (trea) dewayne crowder| treaderrion (trea) dewayne crowder
column3: of pittsburg passed away on friday june 12
column4: 2015. funeral services will be held on tuesday june 16
column5: 2015 at 1:00 p. m. at the daingerfield high school auditorium
column6: with interment to follow at edwards cemetery in mt. pleasant. visitation will be held on monday june 15
column7: 2015 from 6:00 to 8:00 p. m. at the sheppard st. church of christ in mt. pleasant. services are under the direction of curry-welborn funeral home.
